summary: CD Projekt RED не хочет искусственно сделать Cyberpunk 2077 длиннее
title: CD Projekt RED не хочет искусственно сделать Cyberpunk 2077 длиннее
body: Левел-дизайнер Cyberpunk 2077 Майлз Тост (Miles Toast) в интервью GamingBolt рассказал, что в игру добавляют только тот контент, который смотрится органично. Команда не пытается искусственно сделать её длиннее, как это часто бывает в играх с открытым… Читать дальше »

title: Bandai Namco позаботится о Cyberpunk 2077
body: Амбициозный проект Cyberpunk 2077 обзавелся европейским издателем, им будет Bandai Namco. Ранее стало известно, что североамериканским издателем станут Warner Bros. “Наши партнерские отношения с Bandai Namco построены на взаимном доверии, благодаря п… Читать дальше »

body:
Bioware helping on cyberpunk 2077?

Cyberpunk 2077 is apparently playable from start to finish right now, and the development work on-going is focussed on bug fixes, graphical fidelity, optimisation and more. Cd projekt red have brought in outside help from digital scapes DNA to work on tyebgame a company comprisimg of developers from bioware relic and a a few others. I knew this game is going to have pedigree if true i cannot wait for this one

summary: Bandai Namco publicará Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa
title: Bandai Namco publicará Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa
body:
Bandai Namco publicará Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa

Como fue el caso con The Witcher 3, Bandai Namco publicará Cyberpunk 2077 en “mercados europeos seleccionados”.

Esta asociación editorial cubrirá 24 países europeos: Andorra, Austria, Bélgica, Chipre, Dinamarca, Finlandia, Francia, Alemania, Grecia, Islandia, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Mónaco, Malta, Noruega, Portugal, San Marino, España, Suecia, Suiza, los Países Bajos y el…

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 ya cuenta con distribuidora en Europa
title: Cyberpunk 2077 ya cuenta con distribuidora en Europa
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 ya cuenta con distribuidora en Europa

CD Projekt RED ha anunciado que extiende el acuerdo de distribución física con Bandai Namco Entertainment Europe para el lanzamiento de Cyberpunk 2077. Ambas compañías colaboraron en la distribución de The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings y The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt.

http://nosologamer.com/los-fallos-en-las-misiones-de-cyberpunk-2077-pueden-alterar-la-historia/

Bandai Namco traerá el esperado…

summary: Bandai Namco será la encargada de distribuir Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa
title: Bandai Namco será la encargada de distribuir Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa
body:
Bandai Namco será la encargada de distribuir Cyberpunk 2077 en Europa

Desde Bandai Namco han anunciado que mantendrán la colaboración que ya realizaron en el pasado con CD Projekt RED. Esta compañía será la encargada de distribuir Cyberpunk 2077 en 24 países europeos tras los buenos resultados de los trabajos anteriores.

Desde CD Projekthan asegurado que el acuerdo se basa en los férreos cimientos y la confianza desarrollada durante los proyectos anteriores: The…

summary: PlayStation 5: O que sabemos sobre o sucessor do PS4 até agora
title: PlayStation 5: O que sabemos sobre o sucessor do PS4 até agora
body:
Outubro tem sido um mês intenso quando o assunto são vazamentos e declarações sobre o suposto PlayStation 5. Nós resumimos tudo o que saiu neste post aqui >>

Outubro tem sido um mês intenso quando o assunto são vazamentos e declarações sobre o suposto PlayStation 5, console da Sony que deve chegar nos próximos anos para substituir o atual PS4.

Apesar de ainda não termos muitas informações concretas sobre aparência, já podemos “chutar” qual será o hardware, jogos e uma possível janela de lançamento para o videogame. (more…)

summary: Bandai Namco wird Vertriebspartner für Cyberpunk 2077
title: Bandai Namco wird Vertriebspartner für Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Bandai Namco wird Vertriebspartner für Cyberpunk 2077

CD Projekt Red, Entwickler und Publisher der Spiele-Serie The Witcher, und Bandai Namco Entertainment Europe haben vor kurzem ihre Partnerschaft zum Vertrieb von Cyberpunk 2077 in 24 europäischen Ländern bekannt gegeben.

„Unsere derzeitige Vertriebspartnerschaft mit Bandai Namco basiert auf dem starken Fundament und dem Vertrauen, das wir bereits in früheren Projekten aufgebaut haben“,…

View On WordPress

tags: thank you for coming to my oc talk
summary: Cyberpunk 2077: V  Before she moved to Night City, she was married and had a son named Noah. Unfortunately, the family was part...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077: V

  • Before she moved to Night City, she was married and had a son named Noah. Unfortunately, the family was part of a horrific car accident. Her husband suffered a few broken limbs, she suffered a pretty bad spinal injury, and they both suffered the loss of their son. He was only four. 
  • Her gold locket may look like just a regular locket, but it’s actually a memory keeper. Instead of there being pictures inside, it actually records (and keeps) her most fond memories with a simple touch from her finger. There are many of her son. 
  • She’s got special cybernetic braces on legs to help her walk. When she’s kicking ass and taking names but she needs a little boost, they begin to glow. The “boost” may not last long, but when she’s up close and personal to an enemy: BAM! knee to the face
  • When she’s getting a “boost” Jackie looooves to say,”Glo’ up, jaina.”
  • In her past life, she enjoyed playing many songs to her son from her vintage acoustic guitar. He would sit in front of her, closely watch and memorize every single note she played. To humor him, she would sometimes “forget” the last note and have him play it for her. Now, she rarely plays. When she does, she doesn’t play the last note. 
  • She’s very good at reading people, assessing situations and paying close attention to her environment. 
  • She likes to collect buttons. 
  • She may be as patient as a saint with a very professional demeanor but she is knows to crack wise every once and a while.

Thank you for reading my V info dump. ^_^

art by @commander-sarahs-art

summary: One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record...
body:
One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record gameplay and then that into gifs.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

trail.content:
One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record gameplay and then that into gifs.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 – Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?

Die veröffentlichte Gameplay-Demo zum kommende Ego-Shooter “Cyberpunk 2077” konnte durchaus optisch beeindrucken, was die Frage aufwarf, ob die Hardware-Leistung der aktuellen Konsolen Playstation 4 und Xbox One überhaupt ausreichen werde. Diese Frage beantwortet Level-Designer Miles Tost.

Level-Designer Miles Tost betonte bei den Kollegen von Gamingbolt, dass die Current-Gen-Hardware – in Form…
